assert repo.last_commit_msg() == 'init commit'
assert repo._sanitize_amend_commit_message(new_message='test') == 'test'
assert repo._sanitize_amend_commit_message(append_to_msg='test') == """init commit

test"""
assert repo._sanitize_amend_commit_message(previous_message="""init commit

test""", append_to_msg='test') == """init commit

test"""
assert repo._sanitize_amend_commit_message(previous_message="""init commit

test
""", append_to_msg='other test') == """init commit

test
other test"""
with pytest.raises(SystemExit):
    repo._sanitize_amend_commit_message()
